help: Welcome to the Media Downloader Bot! Commands: - /help: Display this help message. How to use: To download media from TikTok simply send a TikTok video or photo link directly to the bot. The bot will process the link and send the media file back to you. Additional Notes: Ensure the TikTok link is directly accessible (not private or restricted). Supported formats: Video and photo.
link_type_undefined: Link type undefined. Please, read instruction: /help
